tool_description: This is the telldus API to manage your tellstick live device to manage your devices and turn on and off lights from the web.
name: Telldus
title: Telldus

api_list.name: /device/dim

required_parameters.name: level
required_parameters.description: The level the device should dim to. This value should be 0-255

api_list.name: /sensor/setIgnore

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Mark a sensor as 'ignored'. Ignored sensors will not show up in sensors/list if not explicit set to do so.

required_parameters.name: ignore
required_parameters.description: 1 to igonre the sensor, 0 to inlude it again

api_list.name: /sensor/info
api_list.description: Returns information about a specific sensor

api_list.name: /device/setParameter
api_list.description: Set a device parameter

api_list.name: /client/info
api_list.description: Returns informaiton about a specific client

optional_parameters.name: uuid
optional_parameters.description: An optional uuid for a client. By specifying the uuid, info about a non registered client can be fetched

optional_parameters.name: extras
optional_parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of extra information to fetch for each returned client. Currently supported fields are: coordinate, timezone and tzoffset

api_list.name: /scheduler/jobInfo
api_list.description: Retrieves info about a specific job

api_list.name: /clients/list
api_list.description: Returns a list of all clients associated with the current user

optional_parameters.name: extras
optional_parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of extra information to fetch for each returned client. Currently supported fields are: coordinate, timezone and tzoffset

api_list.name: /device/learn
api_list.description: Sends a special learn command to some devices that need a special learn-command to be used from TellStick

api_list.name: /device/turnOn
api_list.description: Turns a device on.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The device id to turn on.

api_list.name: /device/bell
api_list.description: Sends bell command to devices supporting this.

api_list.name: /device/up
api_list.description: Send an "up" command to device.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The device id to send the command to.

api_list.name: /group/add
api_list.description: Adds a new group with devices and connects it to a client. The client must be editable for this to work. Please note that groups are devices as well. This means that all device/* commands will work for groups too.

required_parameters.name: devices
required_parameters.description: A comma separated string with the device ids this group should control

api_list.name: /device/down
api_list.description: Sends a "down" command to devices supporting this.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The device id to send the command to

api_list.name: /device/info
api_list.description: Returns information about a specific device

required_parameters.name: supportedMethods
required_parameters.description: The methods supported by the calling application

optional_parameters.name: extras
optional_parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of extra information to fetch for each returned device. Currently supported fields are: coordinate, timezone and tzoffset

api_list.name: /client/register
api_list.description: Register an unregistered client to the calling user

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is an unique id for the client

api_list.name: /device/remove
api_list.description: Removes a device. It is only possible to remove editable devices.

api_list.name: /scheduler/removeJob
api_list.description: Removes a job

api_list.name: /device/add
api_list.description: Adds a new device and connects it to a client. The client must be editable for this to work

api_list.name: /group/remove
api_list.description: Removes a group.

api_list.name: /scheduler/setJob
api_list.description: Creates or updates a job. Set id to 0 if you want to create a new job. If you are creating a new job the deviceId must also be set. The deviceId can only be set upon creating a new job. When updating an existing job the deviceId parameter must be omitted.  Note! Only editable devices can be scheduled.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The job id, when updating an existing job

required_parameters.name: deviceId
required_parameters.description: The device id to schedule. Only valid when creating a new job

required_parameters.name: method
required_parameters.description: What to do when the schdule runs. This should be any of the method constants

required_parameters.name: methodValue
required_parameters.description: Only required for methods that requires this.

required_parameters.name: offset
required_parameters.description: This is only used when type is either 'sunrise' or 'sunset'

required_parameters.name: randomInterval
required_parameters.description: Number of minutes after the specified time to randomize.

required_parameters.name: retries
required_parameters.description: If the client is offline, this specifies the number of times to retry executing the job before consider the job as failed.

required_parameters.name: retryInterval
required_parameters.description: The number if minutes between retries. Example: If retries is 3 and retryInterval is 5 the scheduler will try executing the job every five minutes for fifteen minutes.

required_parameters.name: reps
required_parameters.description: Number of times to resend the job to the client, for better reliability

required_parameters.name: active
required_parameters.description: Is the job active or paused?

required_parameters.name: weekdays
required_parameters.description: A comma separated list of weekdays. 1 is monday. Example: 2,3,4

api_list.name: /sensors/list
api_list.description: Returns a list of all sensors associated with the current user

optional_parameters.name: includeIgnored
optional_parameters.description: Set to 1 to include ignored sensors

api_list.name: /device/stop
api_list.description: Send a "stop" command to device.

api_list.name: /scheduler/jobList
api_list.description: Lists all jobs. The list is sorted by nextRunTime. If nextRunTime is 0 it means the job will not be run at all.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://telldus.p.rapidapi.com/scheduler/jobList"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "telldus.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://telldus.p.rapidapi.com/scheduler/jobList"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "telldus.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /device/setProtocol
api_list.description: Set device protocol

api_list.name: /sensor/setName
api_list.description: Renames a sensor

api_list.name: /client/setName
api_list.description: Renames a client

api_list.name: /device/setName
api_list.description: Renames a device

api_list.name: /devices/list
api_list.description: Returns a list of all devices associated with the current user

required_parameters.name: supportedMethods
required_parameters.description: The methods supported by the calling application

optional_parameters.name: extras
optional_parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of extra information to fetch for each returned device. Currently supported fields are: coordinate, timezone and tzoffset

api_list.name: /device/setModel
api_list.description: Set device model

api_list.name: /client/remove
api_list.description: Removes a client from the user. The client needs to be activated again in order to be used

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is an unique id for the client

api_list.name: /device/command
api_list.description: Sends a command to a device

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The id of the device to turn off

required_parameters.name: method
required_parameters.description: This should be any of the method constants

required_parameters.name: value
required_parameters.description: For command where a value is needed, this is the value

api_list.name: /device/turnOff
api_list.description: Turns a device off.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The device id to turn off.
